content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at (-21, -74)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -21.0, -73.0) mining copper ore
- Iron chest (position -21.5, -74.5) storing copper ore
- Burner inserter (position -20.5, -74.5) moving ore to furnace
- Stone furnace (position -19.0, -74.0) smelting copper plates

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at (-2, -76)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -2.0, -76.0) mining iron ore
- Stone furnace (position -1.0, -74.0)
- Burner inserter (position 0.5, -74.5)
- Iron chest (position 1.5, -74.5) storing iron plates

### Iron Processing Line at (3, -73)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces (positions 3.0, -73.0 and 5.0, -73.0)
- Multiple burner inserters:
  - At position 3.5, -74.5
  - At position 5.5, -74.5
  - At position 1.5, -72.5
  - At position 6.5, -72.5
- Storage chests:
  - Iron chest (position 3.5, -75.5)
  - Iron chest (position 0.5, -72.5)
  - Iron chest (position 7.5, -72.5)
  - Iron chest (position 3.5, -71.5)
- Transport belt system connecting various parts:
  - Belt group from (1.5, -74.5) to (1.5, -72.5)
  - Belt group from (0.5, -70.5) to (7.5, -69.5)
  - Belt group around (-0.5, -71.5) to (1.5, -71.5)
  - Belt group from (0.5, -71.5) to (8.5, -74.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities in occupied spaces
- Check if the target position is clear before placing new entities
- The iron chest placement at (-1.5, -74.5) failed because another entity was already there

### Resource management errors
- Ensure required resources are available in inventory before attempting to insert them
- The attempt to insert coal failed because there was no coal in inventory

### Entity placement optimization
- When placing multiple connected entities, plan the layout to ensure proper spacing and connections
- Consider the working area of entities (miners, inserters) when planning placement to avoid blockages

### Output handling
- Ensure there are appropriate output collectors (chests, belts) for machines to prevent blocking
- The burner mining drill at (-2.0, -76.0) is blocked because there's no proper output collection
